content: lion brand pattern # cts-hat skill level beginner level 1 terryspun article #970 *discontinued* 120 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm hat is worked in rounds in single_crochet to finish sew brim in place inserting a length of cotton stuffing inside shown with beach bag #cts-beachbag 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/beach-bag-cts-beachbag
